pkgmetadata.longdescription: Group Ordinal Method for Multiple Criteria Decision-Making // Implementation of SAPEVO-M, a Group Ordinal Method for Multiple Criteria Decision-Making (MCDM). SAPEVO-M is an acronym for Simple Aggregation of Preferences Expressed by Ordinal Vectors Group Decision Making. This method provides alternatives ranking given decision makers' preferences: criteria preferences and alternatives preferences for each criterion.
